attributes.action: implement the protection of our children from peadophiles and perverts who steal and abuse our children for their own pleasure. Therefore we do believe a law should be implemented to put such people when found guilty to death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As our children are the most precious things we will ever have and furthermore are the future of our society it is our job to protect them from these animals (peadophiles.) These perverts do not deserve to breath the same air as us. In light of the disappearance of Madeline Mccann it seems quite apparent that these perverts are just laughing at the rest of society. IT NEEDS TO BE STOPPED... THE DEATH PENALTY NEEDS TO BE IMPLEMENTED FOR THESE TYPES OF OFFENDERS ONCE THEY ARE FOUND GUILTY....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
